import React from "react"; import Position from "../components/position"; import "./442style.css"; function Formation442() { const players = [ "player1", "player2", "player3", "player4", "player5", "player6", "player7", "player8", "player9", "player10", "player11" ]; const roles = [ "role", "role", "role", "role", "role", "role", "role", "role", "role", "role", "role" ] const roleToPositionMapping = { [players[0]]: roles[0], [players[1]]: roles[1], [players[2]]: roles[2], [players[3]]: roles[3], [players[4]]: roles[4], [players[5]]: roles[5], [players[6]]: roles[6], [players[7]]: roles[7], [players[8]]: roles[8], [players[9]]: roles[9], [players[10]]: roles[10] }; const handleRoleChange = (player, newRole) => { // Update the role for the specified player roleToPositionMapping[player] = newRole; // Log the updated mapping console.log("Updated role mapping:", roleToPositionMapping); }; return (
); } export default Formation442;
